mapper.select: SELECT COMPANYNAME, ADDRESS, COMPANYNUM, CEONAME, DEL, COMPANYTYPE, COMPANYSEQ, MEMBERID, CONTENT, COMIMAGE, EMPCOUNT, SALARYAVG, SALARYSTART, COMYEAR, RETIREE, JOINNER, WEBSITE, MAINSERVICE, TOTALSALE FROM COMPANY WHERE MEMBERID=#{companyid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMPANY(COMPANYNAME, ADDRESS, COMPANYNUM, CEONAME, DEL, COMPANYTYPE, COMPANYSEQ, MEMBERID, CONTENT, COMIMAGE, EMPCOUNT, SALARYAVG, SALARYSTART, COMYEAR, RETIREE, JOINNER, WEBSITE, MAINSERVICE, TOTALSALE, UPDATECOMPANYLIST) VALUES(#{companyname}, #{address}, #{companynum}, #{ceoname}, 0, #{companytype}, COMPANY_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{memberid} , #{content}, #{comimage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content} ,#{salaryavg} , #{salarystart}, #{comyear} , #{retiree} , #{joinner} , #{website}, #{mainservice}, #{totalsale}, #{updatecompanylist} )
